description.value: Moderate Boon You are inspired to create great works and become a virtuoso at all arts. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting]{Specialty Crafting} feat and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Virtuosic Performer]{Virtuosic Performer} feat in all categories of Crafting and Performance.
